skillTree.localised_description: Long-dead destriers, awakened to serve their Unliving masters far beyond death.

effects.description: Mount: Skeletal Steed

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit is Undead (does not rout, immune to terror, becomes unstable when Leadership is low).

ui_effects.localised_text: Explosion does not affect friendly troops

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any large attacker.
When bracing, this unit deals additional damage when attacking charging enemies.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit is Undead (does not rout, immune to terror, becomes unstable when Leadership is low).

ui_effects.localised_text: Explosion does not affect friendly troops

factionEffects.localised_description: Settra the Imperishable is the king of all Tomb Kings. He is a ruthless leader whose thirst for conquest knows no bounds. Settra's power is far greater than any other Tomb King, and his unyielding will is such that he never needs to return to his sarcophagus to rest.

effects.description: Allegiance points gained: +50% for alliances with Tomb Kings

Recommended First Campaign: You start in the heart of Nehekhara, with a powerful well-defended city, strong campaign faction & lord effects, mighty game-changing technologies and unparalleled access to Nehekharan Landmarks
Charge bonus: +10% for Skeleton Chariot, Skeleton Archer Chariot and Royal Chariot units
